passives.name: Excoriate
passives.effects: Gain a random amount of {{as|'''bonus''' critical strike damage|critical damage}} that scales up to {{as|50% of your critical strike chance}}, with the value of this amount changing every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Gain a random amount of {{as|'''bonus''' critical strike damage|critical damage}} that scales up to {{as|50% of your critical strike chance}}, with the value of this amount changing every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
